Package org.sonatype.restsimple.client

Interface Summary
NegotiationHandler Implementation of this class implements the handling logic for content and version negotiation
WebClient A WebClient for RestSimple.
 

Class Summary
RFC2295NegotiationHandler A NegotiationHandler based on RFC 2295 http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2295.txt
WebAHCClient A simple HTTP client which support ServiceDefinition as a source of information when executing the request.
WebProxy A simple proxy that generates RestSimple client from an annotated interface.
WebProxyConfig A WebProxy configuration object that allow configuring a generated WebClient
WebProxyConfig.Builder  
 

Enum Summary
WebClient.AuthScheme  
WebClient.ProxyScheme  
WebClient.TYPE  
 

Exception Summary
WebException An exception thrown when an unexpected exception occurs with the WebProxy and WebClient
